snippet: The men's basketball team at Fordham caught a hot hand when a Jewish cantor named Daniel Pincus began singing "The Star-Spangled Banner" before games.
abstract: The men's basketball team at Fordham caught a hot hand when a Jewish cantor named Daniel Pincus began singing "The Star-Spangled Banner" before games.
lead_paragraph: If you're hoping for a talisman to improve your team's chances of victory, why not make it a man with a talis?

headline.main: At Jesuit School, a Pregame Assist From a Jewish Singer
